description:
Welcome to our trivia podcast! In our laboratory-condition recording studio (not.) we borrowed (stole.) the best ingredients from other trivia podcasts to bring you what we like to call "The best podcast about trivia, music, and movies, from central Illinois EVER."
We include two rounds in most episodes: General Knowledg, and Movies, plus a bonus Wikipedia Listener Challenge every week.
Friend us on Facebook or send us comments at TrivialTriviaPodcast@gmail.com, and you can receive a shoutout on an upcoming episode!
Visit our website at TrivialTriviaPodcast.com!
"Hosts Jeff and Sarah are very amiable and have good chemistry..." - Edgy Podcast Reviews
"It's surprising to find out what you actually do know, and even what don't know, but probably should. It's a good time for all and you'll probably learn something new or remember something you've forgotten.
"Trivial Trivia Podcast. It's a keeper." - The Mac Observer
title: Trivial Trivia Podcast

episodes.title: TTSlam 17
episodes.description: 80's Rockers and Hairbands all around! Enjoy!

episodes.title: TTSlam 16
episodes.description: John Hughes themed! Everyone's favorite movies!

episodes.title: TT Slam 15
episodes.description:
Mysterious Mysteries!  Round 1 will be Famous Unsolved Mysteries, Round 2 will be Mysterious or Secret Music, and Round 3 will be Movies with titles that are questions! Enjoy!

Music during rounds was The Descent by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4490-the-descent
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

episodes.title: TT Slam 14
episodes.description: Who-hoo! The prodigal Slam returns... again! Sarah's on! Greek Mythology, 90's music, & Batman! Enjoy!

episodes.title: TTP 55
episodes.description: In which we pitch-slap you with some awesome trivia about song lyrics and the movie Pitch Perfect! Sarah gets sassy and Jeff gets sultry.

episodes.title: TTSlam 13
episodes.description: Who-hoo! The prodigal Slam returns! Sarah's on vacation, so this is a solo Jeff episode. Magic, Witches, Wizards, Illusionists, and Enchantments. Oh my! Enjoy!

episodes.title: TTP54 - Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows pt 2 and HP Actors
episodes.description: That Gilderoy Lockhart is so dreamy. Thanks to the Potter Puppet Pals for inspiration. Enjoy!

episodes.title: TTP53 - Deathly Hallows pt 1 and School Learnin
episodes.description: Matt Brundage from Another Damn Trivia Show is a guest co-host for episode 53, and quizzes Jeff and Sarah on Stuff you Should Have Learned in School. Plus, we wrack our brains on Harry Potter 7!

episodes.title: TTP52 - Revenge of the Nerds and Colleges
episodes.description: In which Sarah and Jeff discuss the relative merits of comedic stereotypes. Colleges! Revenge of the Nerds! Idiocy! Hilarity!

episodes.title: TTP51 - Wreck-It Ralph and Real Life Bad Guys
episodes.description: Visit us online at http://trivialtriviapodcast.com. Enjoy!

episodes.title: TTP 50
episodes.description: It's Trivial Trivia Podcast's 50th Episode! The first 3 rounds are guest puzzlers Matt B from Another Damn Trivia Show, Doug from Talkin' Bout My Generation, and Mike from the Trivial Trivia Slam! Think that's it??  Oh, there is no way!  We then have a grab bag trivia round as well as our movie of the week, Hairspray!  Check it out!

episodes.title: TTSlam 12
episodes.description: Classic movie plots, clips, and themes! Enjoy!

episodes.title: TTSlam 11
episodes.description:
Autumn Homonyms, Pop and rock tunes put through the String Quartet blender, and movie clips. Enjoy!

Visit http://vitaminstringquartet.com for more info about this awesome group! Visit http://juanitos.net for info on the band that makes our round music.

episodes.title: TTP49 - The Other Sister and Word Games
episodes.description: Jeff and Sarah try their hand at Word Games and 1999's The Other Sister, starring Juliette Lewis and Diane Keaton.

episodes.title: TTP48 - Nightmare Before Christmas and Holiday Traditions
episodes.description: In which Sarah and Jeff discuss the relative merits of various holiday traditions, plus Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas. Cinco de Drinco! Enjoy!

episodes.title: TTP47: Halloween 1978 and October Trivia
episodes.description: Toddler J punches turkeys in the face, and Jeff and Sarah quiz each other on John Carpenter's Halloween and the month of October. Enjoy!

episodes.title: TTP46 - O Brother Where art Thou - Legal Cases
episodes.description: Enjoy our discussion of 2000's Coen Brothers film, O Brother Where Art Thou, as well as famous US legal cases. Mwah ha ha ha ha...

episodes.title: TTP45 - The Truman Show and Books and Authors
episodes.description: In which we discuss The Truman Show (Real Housewives: Ace Ventura Edition) and famous books and authors. Also, Jeff's wardrobe experiences catastrophic structural failure. Enjoy!

episodes.title: TTP44 - Bedknobs, Broomsticks, and Islands
episodes.description: And we're back! Enjoy! I like to move it move it. Yeah!

episodes.title: TTP - Jeff and Sarah are on Talking Bout my Generation
episodes.description: We're on vacation this week, but you should listen to the Talkin' Bout my Generation Podcast. We co-hosted a discussion on The Princess Bride. http://mygenerationpodcast.com

episodes.title: TTP43 - Batman - Movie theme music
episodes.description: Danny Elfman? John Williams? Jeff and Sarah try to stump each other on famous movie theme music. Plus, we discuss Tim Burton's 1989 film Batman. Enjoy!

episodes.title: TTP 42 - Casablanca & Summer Blockbusters
episodes.description: Jeff and Sarah quiz each other on summer blockbuster movies, and the Casablanca. Subscribe at TrivialTriviaPodcast.com. Enjoy!

episodes.title: TTP 41 - Wayne's World and Boats
episodes.description: Jeff and Sarah have a special guest, Doug from Talkin' Bout My Generation!  They quiz each other on Boats and the 1992 film, Wayne's World! Subscribe at TrivialTriviaPodcast.com. Party time, excellent!

episodes.title: TTP 40 - The Hunger Games - Spies
episodes.description: Yo yo! Jeff and Sarah quiz each other on famous fictional and nonfictional spies, and the Jennifer Lawrence film, The Hunger Games. We're excited to announce that our next episode will be a Guest Host episode! Doug, the host of the podcast Talkin' Bout my Generation will be joining us. Subscribe at TrivialTriviaPodcast.com. Enjoy!

episodes.title: TTP 39 - Thor - Fictional Couples
episodes.description: Enjoy jokes about HawkEye! Poor Jeremy Renner. Jeff and Sarah quiz each other on Marvel's Thor and famous fictional couples. Leave us a review in iTunes! "Today is Gonna Be a Great Day" by Bowling for Soup. Enjoy!
